title: Ban the name Eric
body:
> by 0x9982b469910c2ee2ea566dcfcc250cdd34056397 (MrEric)

Should the name Eric be added to the Denied Names list, banning it from Decentraland?

## Description

the name **Eric** is offensive to me

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.io/en/proposal?id=54f142d0-ba8b-11eb-8792-a59102141522)**
author: 0x2Ba0352480bd1Ea073A83e6639b06362131894CE
